message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you mentioned the product has.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $700,000 significantly undervalues the product's worth. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This is a very competitive offer considering its true value.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $850,000. Can you consider this offer?
